    Room

    new Room()
    Room.js, line 18

    Properties:
    Name Type Description
    area Area Area room is in
    defaultItems Array.<number> Default list of item ids that should load in this room
    defaultNpcs Array.<number> Default list of npc ids that should load in this room
    description string Room description seen on 'look'
    exits Array.<object> Exits out of this room { id: number, direction: string, leaveMessage: string }
    id number Area-relative id (vnum)
    items Set Items currently in the room
    npcs Set Npcs currently in the room
    players Set Players currently in the room
    script string Name of custom script attached to this room
    title string Title shown on look/scan

    Members

    spawnedNpcs
    Room.js, line 48

    spawnedNpcs keeps track of NPCs even when they leave the room for the purposes of respawn. So if we spawn NPC A into the room and it walks away we don't want to respawn the NPC until it's killed or otherwise removed from the area

    Methods

    emit(eventName, …args) → {void}
    Room.js, line 59

    Emits event on self and proxies certain events to other entities in the room.
    Parameters:
    Name Type Attributes Description
    eventName string
    args * <repeatable>
    Returns:
    void
